text.section: A person who violates any provision of this subtitle is liable to the person affected by the violation for actual damages caused by the violation and for reasonable attorney's fees.

In addition to the remedies provided under subsection (a) of this section, a person affected by a violation of this subtitle may:
Bring an action for an injunction against any person who violates any provision of this subtitle; and
Seek any other remedy available at law.

The rights, remedies, and prohibitions provided under this subtitle shall be in addition to and cumulative of any other right, remedy, or prohibition provided under common law, federal law, or any other laws of this State, and nothing contained in this subtitle may be construed to deny, abrogate, or impair any such federal or State common-law or statutory right, remedy, or prohibition.
